Armored core 6 inspired sights v.2

Includes different reticles styles.
The top bar also moves up based on your barrel elevation.

The triangle sight could be used for range finding if you did not unlock laser rangefinder yet.
Each triangle represents around 400m distance. You just aim at the tracks of a tank and then read the distance from left to right as 400-800-1200 meters.
Basically you are trying to measure the width of both tracks in triangles and then convert it into meters.

Vanilla Historical Sight Presets

/Explanation
Replicate the historical GPS or FCS look of tanks using the sights provided in War Thunder.

Sight thickness, font size, hue, transparency, layout, have been adjusted.

No custom sights used.

18 presets available.

/install
Extract to War Thunder root folder.
Please read the readme file to find out which presets to use for which tanks.

/Source
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?gid=596389437#gid=596389437

/V1.1
I recommend using new one.

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

As requested: Gun, Missile, and Rocket sights for the Northrop F-5 Tiger II fighter. One sight is for the Aim-9 seeker only; and the other 2 also incorporate either the Zuni or FFAR Mighty Mouse rockets. Special color sight included per request.

Mery Nabakova sight

step by step guide how to install it into your game files (if you are using the steam launcher)

1. open steam, find war thunder, right-click it and open manage, then click on 'browse local files''

2. find UserSights folder in the war thunder root file

3. if you havent done it already, you have to create another folder inside the User sights folder named "all_tanks"

4. download this and then open the zip and copy to clickboard the file named "final"

5. paste the "final" file into the all_tanks folder which is inside UserSights

6. in War thunder, open ...

ADDED TO JAPANESE MEGAPACK

Первая цифра в файле .blk означает закрашены элементы или нет (1 закрашены; 2 не закрашены).
Вторая цифра в файле .blk означает размер прицела (чем больше цифра, тем больше прицел)

Для установки надо кинуть файлы в папку с путём \War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

Первая цифра номер прицела
Вторая цифра в названии прицела отображает тип прицела 1 с drawCentralLineVert/drawCentralLineHorz 2 без
Третья в свою очередь размер, чем больше значение тем меньше прицел

Хотел бы сделать и более качественный прицел но игра перестаёт корректно его отображать

My final sights pack.

It includes only sights 7 that I created and personally use. Covering low to top tier and missile systems.
There is nothing more I wanna make so this should be my last upload unless they would need editing.
